titleStmt.title: Provisional Government of the State of Kentucky, Journal
CWG16330

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: The Council met: J. W. Crockett President Pro.tem in the chair.

Mr H. W. Bruce moved a reconsideration of the vote by which the bill entitled "an ^act^ to raise and arm thirty regiments of Volunteer infantry and Cavalry" was passed" and the vote being taken on said motion it was decided in the affirmative.
And then on motion the vote by which the third reading of said bill was dispensed with was also reconsidered.

Mr H. W. Bruce moved that said now be referred to a select Committee of three with instructions to report, which motion prevailed Where upon the President Pro Tem appointed on said Committee Messrs Chrisman and H. W. Bruce
On motion Mr Crockett was added to said Committee.
And then the Council adjourned until tomorrow at 10 O'Clock A. M.
